Geo Tools Scripts

We recommend to look at pk-tools, Gdal-ogr and Open-foris for building stand alone geoprocessing routines. This page collect a series of supplementary scripts that can be used as stand alone programs after installation.

Zonal statistic

  • ost4sem_zonal_stats.py calculates mean min max and stdev values of a continues raster (e.g. dem) based on a different categorized raster.

The output is a txt file with the statistical value of each category.

Add item area to a shapefile

  • addattr-area.py Command line to add attribute area at each polygon in a shapefile.

Intersect two shape files

  • intersect.py Command line to intersect two shape files.

Extract unique values between two raster maps

  • count_uniq.py extracts unique pare of values between two tifs/rasters and stores the results in a txt file.

Dealing with simple statistic in large txt file

* ost4sem_average.sh calculate average of a txt file based on unique id column
* ost4sem_average_w.sh calculate weigthed average of a txt file based on unique id column and weighted column
* ost4sem_sum.sh calculate sum of a txt file based on unique id column

Create arc/info ascii grid

* ost4sem_chess_grid.sh create an arc/info chess_grid with pixel value 1 or 2

  • More ost4sem tools will be uploaded soon

    Modeling

    Tools of correlation and modeling analisis between two images.

  • oft-pearson.bash calcualte a r pearsono coefficencinet between two immages.
